column4: what is that?
can you play them on your ubuntu? can you browse the zune files using terminal?
by the way, you might try, go to terminal and cd to it's path and try to copy
I can't find the path, that's the problem
can you browse it through file browser?(nautilus)
yes.
ok, then in terminal try gksudo nautilus        and browse the zune and copy the file to the computer through the same nautilus
okay
suddenly, my zune disappeared... it's still available through the normal file browser, but not root...
is it shown in the Places> computer ?
yep. but not in nautilus from root
ok, in terminal try to cd to /media/  and see whether its seen there
already ahead of you, it's not there, or in /dev
any ideas?
would you like to waste some time at pm?
pm?
what the fuck did that just do to my computer?
better, live it to M$ :(
I'm not mad at you, my computer went to a text screen, and I never got back to the desktop.
my bad :(
it's no big deal, I just had to reboot 3 times (two were cause of my shitty bios)
